resources.string: Press here to send a bug report

V 1.12
-Fixed back button on finals page
-Fixed help page

V 1.1
-Added Final Schedules
-Fixed days countdown
-Shortened name to "Bell Schedules" in app drawer
-Removed all Dear Day related things
-Fixed some errors

V 1.0_9.1 - Bug Fixes
-Fixed tablet force close
-Fixed exiting from main menu
-Made refresh more efficient and less laggy.
-Now lets you know when you refreshed
-Hid force to dear day, it's not implemented yet.

V 1.0_9 - Cleanup update!
-Made startup times faster
-Hid changelog
-Added refresh button
-Added a days left of school countdown
-Moved future content to Google Play
-Removed contact developer
-Added send a suggestion
-Moved supported devices to bug report
-Removed about
-Moved version and copyright info to help
-Removed useless strings
-Removed supported devices

V 1.0_8
-Added a temporary fix to lunch bug.

V 1.0_7
-Removed old comments and junk
-Green text now works on regular day.
-Fixed supported devices page.
-Removed notification, replaced it with a dialog.

V 1.0_6
-Added experimental green highlight to regular bells page.

V 1.0_5
-Fixed Supported Devices page
-Fixed device email
-Disabled landscape mode
-Fixed bug report send

V 1.0_4
-Added alert to tablets
-Fixed some pages content
-Converted most text items to strings for better performance
-Fixed activity titles

V 1.0_3
-Added notifications for late starts and D.E.A.R.

V 1.0_2
-Fixed most email bugs.

V 1.0_1
-Added some new content in help directories
-Fixed some tablet text issues

V 1.0 - First Build
